Does anybody know what touchy and good does
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Does anybody know what touchy and good does
By renmazuo on Tuesday, January 15, 2002 - 11:17 am:

Every time i train the touchy and good thing pops up and i dont know why any ideas

By bela karolyi on Tuesday, January 15, 2002 - 12:46 pm:

From what I understand (I'm just an MR3 rookie, myself), that message indicates how your monster's personality (touchy) makes it respond to your post-training remarks. For example, my Night Flyer is "sensitive" and a "perfectionist." When she does "great" and I say "as expected," I often get the "sensitive: good" message.

Try saying different things to your monster and you may get different reactions.
